label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 22 production by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 22 production by T cells.

label.value: in vitro assay measuring epitope specific T cell killing

definition.value: An in vitro cell killing assay that measures the killing of antigen presenting cells (APC) by T cells whose TCR recognizes an epitope presented by the APC.

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific granzyme A release by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects epitope specific granzyme A release by T cells.

label.value: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific granzyme A release by T cells

definition.value: A detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay that detects epitope specific granzyme A release by T cells.

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific granzyme B release by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects epitope specific granzyme B release by T cells.

label.value: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific granzyme B release by T cells

definition.value: A detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay that detects epitope specific granzyme B release by T cells

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific macrophage migration inhibitory factor (MIF) production by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects macrophage migration inhibitory factor (MIF) production by T cells.

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific oncostatin M production by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects oncostatin M production by T cells.

label.value: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific perforin release by T cells

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunospot assay that detects epitope specific perforin release by T cells.

label.value: in vivo assay measuring epitope specific proliferation of T cells

definition.value: A T cell epitope specific proliferation assay that is performed in vivo.

label.value: in vitro assay measuring epitope specific proliferation of T cells

definition.value: A T cell epitope specific proliferation assay that is performed on cells in vitro.

label.value: assay measuring qualitative binding of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: An assay that detects the binding of a MHC molecule with a ligand, and produces a qualitative measurement of the binding as an output.

label.value: in vivo assay measuring T cell epitope specific protection from challenge

definition.value: An efficacy of T cell epitope intervention experiment that uses a epitope protection experiment.

label.value: assay measuring T cell epitope specific suppression in vitro

definition.value: T cell epitope dependent biological activity assay that detects suppression of an in vitro response.

label.value: MHC ligand assay

definition.value: An immune epitope assay that characterizes the structrue of a MHC-ligand complex, or detects the processing and presentation of a ligand by an antigen presenting cell, or the binding of a ligand to an MHC molecule.

label.value: reporter gene assay

definition.value: An assay that detects expression of a reporter gene that was inserted under the control of a regulatory sequence of interest.

label.value: enhancer activity detection by reporter gene assay

definition.value: A reporter gene assay that detects expression of a reporter gene that was inserted under the control of an enhancer of interest.

label.value: transcription cofactor activity region identification by ChIP-Seq assay

definition.value: A ChIP-seq assay that identifies regions of chromatin bound to a chromatin modifying protein, e.g. a histone acetyltransferase.

label.value: transcript expression location detection by hybridization chain reaction assay

definition.value: An in situ hybridization assay in which the location (e.g. anatomical/tissue) of a transcript is detected by a multiplexed fluorescent in situ hybridization, based on orthogonal amplification with hybridization chain reactions (HCR). RNA probes complementary to mRNA targets trigger chain reactions in which fluorophore-labeled RNA hairpins self-assemble into tethered fluorescent amplification polymers.

label.value: Tet-assisted bisulfite sequencing assay

definition.value: A bisulfite sequencing assay that identifies genomic methylation patterns by using a bisulfite based protocol with the Tet enzyme to differentiate 5-hydroxylmethylcytosine (5hmC) from 5-methylcytosine (5mC) through a step-wise oxidative demethylation of 5mC, converting it to 5-carboxylcytosine (5caC) while keeping 5hmC protected.

label.value: MethylC-Capture sequencing assay

definition.value: A bisulfite sequencing assay in which a whole-genome sequencing library is prepared, bisulfite converted and amplified, followed by a capture enriching for targeted bisulfite-converted DNA fragments that are are subsequently identified by DNA sequencing.

label.value: carboxyfluorescein succinimidyl ester staining assay measuring epitope specific proliferation of T cells

definition.value: A CFSE assay that detects T cell epitope specific proliferation in vitro.

label.value: assay measuring the dissociation constant [KD] of a T cell epitope:MHC:TCR complex

definition.value: A T cell epitope binding constant determination assay that measures the dissociation constant KD.

label.value: assay measuring the on rate [kon] of a T cell epitope:MHC:TCR complex

definition.value: A T cell epitope binding constant determination assay that measures the on rate.

label.value: assay measuring the off rate [koff] of a T cell epitope:MHC:TCR complex

definition.value: A T cell epitope binding constant determination assay that measures the off rate.

label.value: assay measuring the association constant [KA] of a T cell epitope:MHC:TCR complex

definition.value: A T cell epitope binding constant determination assay that measures the association constant KA.

label.value: small-angle scattering assay determining the 3D structure of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A small-angle scattering 3D molecular structure determination assay that characterizes the 3-dimensional molecular structure of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

label.value: bio-layer interferometry assay measuring the on rate [kon] of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A bio-layer interferometry assay that measures the on rate of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: bio-layer interferometry assay measuring the off rate [koff] of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A bio-layer interferometry assay that measures the off rate of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: bio-layer interferometry assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A bio-layer interferometry assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: bio-layer interferometry assay measuring the dissociation constant [KD] of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A bio-layer interferometry assay that measures the dissociation constant [KD] of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: carboxyfluorescein succinimidyl ester staining assay

definition.value: a assay detecting a molecular label assay where the amount of carboxyfluorescein succinimidyl ester is measured using fluorescence detection.

label.value: bio-layer interferometry assay

definition.value: A binding assay that detects a shift in the interference pattern reflected from a layer of immobilized material on the biosensor tip to measure binding to- or dissociating from the material on the biosensor.

label.value: small-angle scattering 3D molecular structure determination assay

definition.value: A 3D molecular structure determination assay in which the scattering pattern of a neutron or x-ray beam targeted at a material entity is recorded at small angles relative to the incident beam to determine the size, shape and structure of the material entity examined.

label.value: digital object identifier

definition.value: A centrally registered identifier symbol used to uniquely identify objects given by International DOI Foundation. The DOI system is particularly used for electronic documents such as journal articles.

label.value: enhanced cross-linking immunoprecipitation high-throughput sequencing assay

definition.value: An iCLIP assay that is enhanced to robustly identify protein-RNA interactions with high efficiency through improvements in library preparation of RNA fragments.

label.value: small RNA sequencing assay

definition.value: An RNA-seq assay which is targeting small RNA (< 200 bp) sequences such as, but not exclusive to, miRNAs using, for example, small RNA library preparation kits.

label.value: bromouridine labeling and sequencing assay

definition.value: An RNA-seq assay to identify spans of nascent transcription in the genome through isolation of recent bromouridine (Bru) labelled RNAs.

label.value: bromouridine pulse-chase and sequencing assay

definition.value: An RNA-seq assay to identify RNA populations of specific ages through isolation of RNAs first labelled with bromouridine (Bru) followed by chasing in uridine for different periods of time.

label.value: cytometry time of flight assay

definition.value: A cytometry assay in which the presence of molecules of interest on or in cells is indicated by binding of antibodies labeled with rare earth element tags which are detected by time-of-flight mass spectrometry.

label.value: high performance liquid chromotography assay

definition.value: An analytical chromatography assay that utilizes a high performance liquid chromatography instrument for separation of compounts in a solution.

label.value: whole genome sequencing assay

definition.value: A DNA sequencing assay that intends to provide information about the sequence of an entire genome of an organism.

label.value: exome sequencing assay

definition.value: A DNA sequencing assay that intends to provide information about the sequence of the protein coding components of a genome (exons).

label.value: microscopy assay

definition.value: An imaging assay that utilizes a microscope to magnify features of the visualized material of interest that are not visible to naked eye.

label.value: mixed lymphocyte reaction assay

definition.value: A cytometry assay where lymphocytes from two individuals are co-cultured with the lymphocytes from one of the allogeneic individuals (Responders) being labeled (with 3H Thymidine or BrdU) and the proliferation of the labeled cells is measured, which is thought to reflect recognition of histocompatibility antigens on the unlabeled cells (stimulators).

label.value: killer cell immunoglobulin-like receptor typing assay

definition.value: A genotyping assay in which the alleles of genes encoding for killer cell immunoglobulin-like receptors are determined.

label.value: major histocompatibility typing assay

definition.value: A genotyping assay in which the alleles of genes encoding for major histocompatibility complex molecules are determined.

label.value: pulse stable isotope labeling by amino acids in cell culture

definition.value: An assay that detects differences in protein abundance using samples that have been metabolically labeled in vivo with a stable non-radioactive heavy isotope containing amino acid for a short period of time. After diluting the pulsed cells into growth media without label, high resolution mass spectrometry-based proteomics is used to analyze the time-dependent decay and determine protein stability.

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring  epitope specific chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 20 production by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 20 production by T cells.

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 20 production by T cells

definition.value: A T cell epitope specific cytokine production assay that detects chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 20 production by T cells.
